Овервотчу 1 - Да, Овервотчу 2 - Нет.

15 баксов за полтора часа ПВЕ геймплея. 1500 рублей. Я за столько эту помойку покупал 1 января 2017 года. Тех, кто поведется на данное "выгодное" предложение можно спокойно записывать в список опущенцев. Да и в принципе всех тех, кто заносит свои кровные шекели Близзардам на покупку скинчиков и баттлпасиков.

Ах ну и да, не стоит забывать, что те деньги, которые люди сливали на покупку этой игры были компенсированы скинчиком Клоуна на Сомбру. Иронично, не правда ли?

Плюсы игры:
- Сочная жопа Вдовы (литературно самый главный плюс)
Минусы игры:
- Это не порно пазлы (самый популярный вид игр в нашем любимом Steam)
- Вдова вам не даст (только если на особых сайтах)
- Эта игра от близзардов (контора пидорасов)

Как мы видим, минусов у игры больше УВЫ джокер

Well. I played since OW1. And This is. OW1 just with a "Fresh" Coat of new Paint over it and a 2 slapped onto it.
They Promised so much. We Pre-orderd like good lemmings. And now? Now i still play TF2. 
OW2 PVE? Yeah... but behind a Paywall... wait... diden't we pay for PVE? DIDEN'T WE PAY ~40-60€? Where did that go?
In 1 Battlepass. Three new Heros... and One new Mode. 
1 Pass, 3 Heros and some new Maps? Oh and some Mid Tier Skins. Now they want EVEN More Money to Play the "Story" Mission? You got to be shitting me. 
Do yourself a Favor. If you like the Game Play it. But for the love of god. Dont Stuff their Throat with Money. The Devs deserve it... but i dont wanna know how much they get from it. Not really a Level System, No real Reward for leveling up like in the First Game in case of a Lootbox (A Keyless Create you get for EVERY level up) to get Skins. Nah you have to pay RL Money. "But they give you-" What One Skin out of how many? And tell me. How much do you think its worth? Exactly.
Nothing.
Like i said. Play if you want. But i realy hate that it fell of so hard. A Franchise died on lies, cut Promises and ignorance. 
Well imma hop into Dustbowl. See ya. And Have fun i guess.

(BTW Skins are still way to expensiv in my Opinion.)

The gameplay is amazing (besides Hanzo and Widowmaker still being present) and the hero roster is pretty much unmatched, but they canceled a large majority of their PvE gamemode that they've been working on for five years at the absolute minimum, the thing that truly made Overwatch 2 be a sequel to Overwatch 1. They hyped it up in November 2019 only to completely destroy the player base's trust in May 2023. The worst fear for PvE was having it be a part of the game's seasonal model instead of being a standalone campaign and behold, it unfortunately came true. I played through all three story missions and Underworld and while they're fun, it's just depressing to think about what we could've had. 

Overwatch 2 is just an update to Overwatch 1 to go free to play while removing key elements of the game and introducing predatory monetization features. It isn't a sequel, it's a heavy downgrade.

For my review, I will hit the base points.

First.
They give you objectively awful characters, unless you play an insane amount of games (You need to play 25 full matches to unlock one of the meh support characters, which is about 3 hours at least of gaming) and then for other characters you need to do Call Of Duty Black Ops 3 easter egg gameplay to get, along with 3 hours of gameplay. 
Or you can just give them a bunch of money to get what should be a completely free character. 
They also only give you like 12, of the 40 or so. 

Second. 
Man I love having to pay for a battlepass to get literally anything including characters, you know, the entire thing the entire game is built around, which is extremely stupid to have to do. 

Third.
I love my enemies using their funny full roster of characters to kill me because I am forced to play the one class that literally cannot beat them in any engagement ever, because they paid over 40 dollars for all of them. 

Fourth.
It's just a bad game with absolutely horrendous business practice. They make it as much fun as going to the dentist and they begin drilling into your teeth without giving you novocaine or anything else to numb the pain.

I played one match with people, it froze for 5 seconds, I pressed D and W once, and was instant transmissioned through a wall and teleported while apparently running 90 feet into nothing, then fell into an instant killbox, which then froze my game and it crashed. 
Best first match I could ever ask for.

Just installed this game to give it a negative review - here it is.

OW1>OW2

They deleted OW1 in favor for battlepasses, selling PVE missions and previous OW1 cosmetics for >$15 a pop.

Nothing has changed in this "sequel" besides the above and a minor graphics/UI update. OW1 went 4 years without content for this "sequel".

I entered the Overwatch universe through its second installment, primarily due to friends. Not having experienced the first game, I was eager for Overwatch 2's launch. Sadly, my excitement was overshadowed by the letdown of unfulfilled PvE promises. Instead of substantial improvements, we got weekly PvE missions that mirrored the ones in Overwatch 1. The introduction of paid options for skins that used to be free in Overwatch 1 felt like a bait-and-switch. The Overwatch 2 release with minimal advancements left me questioning the choices made by the developers.

My experience with matchmaking has been frustrating. It struggles to pair players of equal skill, resulting in an unsatisfying gameplay environment. Furthermore, the change from 6-player teams to 5-player teams feels imbalanced and has had a negative impact on my overall enjoyment.

While playing Overwatch 2 with friends has had its enjoyable moments, the unfulfilled promises and the issues with matchmaking and team balance have left me feeling cheated by the developers/publisher. This makes it hard for me to recommend the game wholeheartedly.

猫

从前，我养了一只猫，我有十块钱，会用八块钱给它买吃的，经常给它洗澡，它也很粘我。

后来，我带它出去玩，路人觉得它很可爱，他们给它喂猫粮，火腿肠，我很不开心，因为它是我的。我想把它抱回家，可是它挣脱我，冲着给它好吃的人喵喵，我抱了几次他都不跟我走，还挠伤了我，于是我转身就走了.....

后来，偶然在路上遇到了它，它身上脏兮兮的。路人们只会给它好吃的，陪它玩玩，却不会带它回家，给它洗澡。它看到我后就跟着我回家，我把它关在了门外，它在门外喵喵地叫着，叫的我很难受，[h1] 可是我不会再要它了 [/h1]。

cat

Once upon a time, I had a cat, I had ten dollars, I would buy it food for eight dollars, bathe it often, and it was very sticky to me.

Later, I took it out to play, passers-by thought it was cute, they fed it cat food, ham sausage, I was very unhappy because it was mine. I wanted to carry it home, but he broke away from me and meowed at the person who gave it good food, I hugged him a few times and he didn't go with me, and scratched me, so I turned around and left.....

Later, I came across it by chance on the road, and it was dirty. Passers-by will only give it good food and play with it, but they will not take it home and bathe it. It saw me and followed me home, I shut it out, it meowed outside the door, it was very uncomfortable, [h1] but I wouldn't want it anymore [/h1].

[spoiler] 当游戏不再纯粹，当游戏公司一心只想着钱，玩家的情怀和喜爱将会化为灰烬。When the game is no longer pure, when the game company is only focused on money, the feelings and affection of players will be reduced to ashes. [/spoiler]

[strike] 不是人们抛弃了守望先锋。而是守望先锋不会是玩家的英雄了。再也不会是了。It's not that people abandoned Overwatch. It's that Overwatch won't be the player's hero anymore. Not Anymore.

Первая часть была хорошей, я не жалею, что потратил 700+ часов в ней, но вот когда они сделали "апгрейд" до второй части - все пошло по одному месту. Плюсов у игры очень мало, но они все же есть, а вот минусов.. целая куча. Донат система, баги, лгбт повестки (хотя тут кому как) и многое другое. 
Если вы новичок - то стоит попробовать, часиков на 70 она вас затянет. Ну а если вы старичок, который играл еще в первую часть - то не стоит даже заходить в нее.
P.S. У меня 1к часов в этой игре.
